summary: A 17-year-old is on house arrest for the summer while his mother is away on business. A horrifying incident occurs leaving an ominous presence in the house.
cast: Keir Gilchrist|Stella Maeve|Maestro Harrell|Gracie Gillam|Peter Stormare|Dinora Walcott
keywords: woman wears a swimsuit|man wears a swimsuit|woman hits a man|house arrest|17 year old
title: Dark Summer
